display_element.label: IP type
display_element.description: Choose whether you are looking for transcription factors or histone marks.

display_element.label: Sequence files:
display_element.description: Choose fastq-format files for both your pulldown/IP and the input/control.  Files should end with "fastq.gz".

display_element.label: Sample annotations:
display_element.description: Choose a sample annotation file.  This should have two columns, separated by a "tab" (tab-delimited).  The first column has the FASTQ file (e.g. "XYZ_R1.fastq.gz") for the pulldown/IP sample.  The second column has the FASTQ file for the control/input sample.  There should NOT be a column header.

display_element.label: Reference genome
display_element.description: Choose the reference genome to use for this process.

display_element.label: Output zip-archive name:
display_element.description: Name the output file.  Result will be a "zip" archive.  If you enter "my_output", then the results will be "my_output.zip".
